news.title: LCD Soundsystem Announce 2026 Chicago Shows
news.summary: James Murphy and the band’s latest residency takes them to the Byline Bank Aragon Ballroom in March

news.title: Rosalía Announces Massive 2026 Tour
news.summary: Dates in North and South America and Europe behind Lux kick off in March

news.title: Steve Cropper, Revered Guitarist of Booker T. & the M.G.’s, Dies at 84
news.summary: Cropper shaped the sound of Memphis soul as an original member of the Stax Records house band
